channel.title: Project P.2.P | 718+
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://project-p2p.info/assets/img/logo.png[/img] [SIZE=6]REVAMPED & ONLINE[/SIZE]
[B]INTRODUCTION[/B] Welcome to Project P.2.P, where your rsps experience changes for the better! We offer the most immersive and exciting gameplay that you've yet to see! Along with quality updates and a hardworking and loyal group of staff, we are the toughest server to compete with! At Project P.2.P, we understand that not everyone lives under the same timezone and or might have other commitments such as university or school... which is the reason we only use the most advanced DDoS protected servers that run morning to night, 24/7. We also know that a server is nothing without a community, at Project P.2.P you'll not only find the most friendly and active players in-game but a thriving assembly located at our forums as well! What are you waiting for... Project P.2.P isn't! See you around!
[B]DEVELOPERS[/B] Project Adam
[B]LINKS[/B] [URL=http://"http://www.project-p2p.info/"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.project-p2p.info/download/client.jar"]Play Project P.2.P Play Now[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.project-p2p.info/forums/"]Project P.2.P Forums[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.project-p2p.info/highscores/"]Project P.2.P Highscores[/URL]
[B]CONTENT LOG[/B] [ul][*]Construction (POH) - Buildable Rooms, Buildable Furniture - Objects Save [*]Not pay2win [*]Completely redone drop system, drops are fair! [*]Double experience weekends [*]Farming [*]Custom Dungeoneering (Only Temporary) [*]Personal Godwars Bosses [*]Slayer - Slayer Tasks [*]Customizable cape particles [*]Social Slayer (Co-Op Slayer) [*]Shooting Stars [*]Enhanced account security pins [*]Prestige System [*]Summoning [*]Money Pouch [*]Squeal Of Fortune [*]Tool belt [*]In-game trivia [*]Unique Home Location [*]Completionist Cape - With Requirements [*]Evil Trees [*]Working Chinchompas [*]Bonecrusher [*]& Much More[/ul]
[B]MEDIA CLICK FOR FULL IMAGE[/B] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/xHOeXKA.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/a1Iw03O.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/T32ExRP.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/dBAd4/5a8894a3d1.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/o3XCSAV.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/ILOuVOW.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/TPq5tCh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YrA7F1T.png[/img] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/kVnpED4.png[/img] Rewarded with XP when being the first person to discover the Star [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/urtEutu.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/dBz7p/afd9aa4713.png[/img] Alching, enchanting and superheating works fully, just examine an item to see the alch value! [img]http://puu.sh/jKG31/f4c0a640f4.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/dBztt/2663d8868e.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/jKFUt/facc11062f.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/jKFIl/d7bfad7542.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/jVXNk/f7d3ec6647.png[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/jVXRM/11c93d95da.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/ea8a8e3df12859beac183873829527ea.png[/img] [img]http://i.imgur.com/I9EfUlQ.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/24674001dc6ca8c5c78d6790558080cf.png[/img] [img]http://i.gyazo.com/507d860fb3194fc3252935f83be509ad.png[/img] [img]http://www.speedtest.net/result/3414058867.png[/img]
[URL=http://"http://project-p2p.info/forums/index.php?/topic/7-projects-updates/#entry10"]UPDATE THREAD[/URL]

[CENTER]
[SIZE=6]REVAMPED & ONLINE[/SIZE]

INTRODUCTION
Welcome to Project P.2.P, where your rsps experience changes for the better! We offer the most immersive and exciting gameplay that you’ve yet to see! Along with quality updates and a hardworking and loyal group of staff, we are the toughest server to compete with! At Project P.2.P, we understand that not everyone lives under the same timezone and or might have other commitments such as university or school… which is the reason we only use the most advanced DDoS protected servers that run morning to night, 24/7. We also know that a server is nothing without a community, at Project P.2.P you’ll not only find the most friendly and active players in-game but a thriving assembly located at our forums as well!
What are you waiting for… Project P.2.P isn’t!
See you around!
